Landon L is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and music producer. He is a self-taught musician who is also the founder of an independent record label “LLM Inc.”

After surviving two near fatal car accidents in May. 2017 and July. 2018 he was forced to retire from his professional soccer career of 14 years due to sustaining severe traumatic brain injuries which lead to multiple concussions.

It took him over two years to recover and is still in the process of rehabilitation although he is now back to producing, writing, and creating music inspired by all aspects of life.

Landon L is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and music producer. He is a self-taught musician who is also the founder of an independent record label “LLM Inc.”

After surviving two near fatal car accidents in May. 2017 and July. 2018 he was forced to retire from his professional soccer career of 14 years due to sustaining severe traumatic brain injuries which lead to multiple concussions.

It took him over two years to recover and is still in the process of rehabilitation although he is now back to producing, writing, and creating music inspired by all aspects of life.

Landon L is a Canadian singer, songwriter, and music producer. He is a self-taught musician who is also the founder of an independent record label “LLM Inc.”

After surviving two near fatal car accidents in May. 2017 and July. 2018 he was forced to retire from his professional soccer career of 14 years due to sustaining severe traumatic brain injuries which lead to multiple concussions.

It took him over two years to recover and is still in the process of rehabilitation although he is now back to producing, writing, and creating music inspired by all aspects of life.
